ai-ja364:1.3_0: if the number of days is seen;
ai-ja364:2.3_0: and it is for the most excellent of perception,
ai-ja364:3.2_0: but the discerning don’t get it.
ai-ja364:3.3_0: but craven, they’ve gone to the mountain,
ai-ja364:5.3_0: They pass away old age and death,
ai-ja364:5.4_0: staying in the pleasures of the lay life.
ai-ja364:6.1_0: A legal procedure of ejection for not making amends.
